question: Is there research that investigates embedding multi-bit data into watermarks to improve resilience to text corruption, particularly aimed at safeguarding keywords and syntactic elements from modification?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: Is there research that investigates embedding multi-bit data into watermarks to improve resilience to text corruption, particularly aimed at safeguarding keywords and syntactic elements from modification?
